The Bone Snatcher is about a group miners who go on a search for a missing crew of miners in the Namib Desert. When the find them, they do not realize that what was going on with them is solely linked to an unseen and ancient phenomenon: The dust group had gotten involved with possible living fossils… They are long lost kidnappers and now their preacher seeks vengeance.

Michael Dudikoff stars as Joe Armstrong a martial artist who fights ninjas who are stealing weapons from the U.S Army, in this entertaining yet admittedly brainless comedic action film. This film is clearly an homage to both "Miami Vice" and has some elements that pay homage to "Honey I Shrunk the Kids", which was released a few months prior.
Featuring cameos from biggest stars of the 80's such as Martin Kove, Arnold Vosloo
